feed.title: Jan Hovancik
feed.subtitle: Open-source enthusiast, connecting the dots in Product teams.

entry.title: Stretchly 1.15 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.15 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • new end-of-the-break sound
  • both left and right click on tray opens menu (Windows)
  • double click on tray opens Preferences (Windows)
  • adds Vietnamese translations
  • reset breaks shortcut (advanced option)
  • skip to the next break shortcut (advanced option)
  • respect Do Not Disturb on Linux distros (KDE, XFCE, GNOME)

Changed

  • updated many translations

Fixed

  • improve Do Not Disturb detection

entry.title: Stretchly is now available in Microsoft Store
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that Stretchly is now available in official Microsoft Store. I hope you will find this useful.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

entry.title: Stretchly 1.14.1 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.14.1 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • advanced option to not show menubar (tray) icon

Fixed

  • break progress bar overflowing on tall screens
  • dock icon staying after break on macOS

Changed

  • updated many translations

entry.title: Stretchly 1.14 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.14 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • new break ideas
  • ability to open Preferences window from command line
  • advanced option to set different sounds for Mini and Long Breaks
  • advanced option to set different color theme for Mini and Long Breaks

Fixed

  • error when checking for new version fails
  • VoiceOver glitch on mac
  • notifications getting stacked in Notification center (macOS, Linux)
  • notifications preventing Gnome DE from sleeping

Changed

  • improved linux Preferences positioning
  • updated many translations

entry.title: Stretchly 1.13 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.13 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • Galician translations
  • Filipino translations

Fixed

  • time translations for Chinese
  • tray icon popup on Linux

Changed

  • updated many translations
  • merged pauseBreaksShortcut and resumeBreaksShortcut to pauseBreaksToggleShortcut

entry.title: Stretchly available on Flathub
entry.content:
Hi all,

I'm really happy to announce that Stretchly can now be installed from flathub, with flatpak install flathub net.hovancik.Stretchly command.

This feature was brought to you by community member Jordan Williams. Many thanks!

entry.title: Stretchly 1.12 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.12 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • support for Flatpak (as of writing, still needs to be processed)

Changed

  • updated many translations
  • remaining times are more exact
  • only update tray when needed

Removed

  • no Linux ARM32 builds, as CI does not support them anymore

entry.title: Stretchly 1.11 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.11 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • Japanese translations
  • break ideas are translatable
  • unregister shortcuts on app's quit

Changed

  • updated many translations
  • no Linux 32 builds, as Electron does not support them anymore

Fixed

  • crashing when skipping to break and time to break in tray
  • Portuguese and Brazilian labels in welcome screen
  • partial minutes in break preferences
  • counting break time when break starts
  • breaks not being finished when exclusion starts
  • incorrect format in logs
  • Preferences bigger then available height

entry.title: Stretchly 1.10 is now available
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.10 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support!

Added

  • advanced option for app exclusion check interval
  • build for Apple silicon
  • ability to schedule break from command line

Changed

  • breaks can't be paused while in break and strict mode is active
  • updated many translations

entry.title: 2021 Top DiscoverBSD and BSDSec articles
entry.content:
That time of year again :) I took articles based on the number of visits, so there are also older articles.

DiscoverBSD

  • How to install Gnome on OpenBSD
  • FreeBSD 13.0 – Full Desktop Experience
  • OpenBSD booting multi-user on Apple M1
  • Customizing OpenBSD xenodm
  • OpenBSD and Wayland
  • FreeBSD Desktop for PineBook Pro
  • FreeBSD 13 released: Here is how to upgrade FreeBSD 12 to 13
  • A Linux Users Experience Switching To OpenBSD
  • Testing Linux Steam Proton on GhostBSD (FreeBSD) with BSD linuxulator
  • Nix package manager in FreeBSD

BSD Sec

  • OpenBSD Errata: June 8, 2021 (cpuswitch inteldrm)
  • OpenBGPD 7.0 released
  • FreeBSD Quarterly Status Report - Second Quarter 2021
  • FreeBSD Quarterly Status Report - Third Quarter 2020
  • FreeBSD Quarterly Status Report - Fourth Quarter 2020
  • OpenBSD 6.7 released - May 19, 2020
  • OpenBSD 6.0 released May 1
  • OpenBSD 7.0 released, Oct 14
  • FreeBSD Quarterly Status Report - Third Quarter 2021
  • FreeBSD Security Advisory FreeBSD-SA-20:20.ipv6

entry.title: Stretchly 1.9 released
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I am really happy to announce, that version 1.9 of Stretchly is here! You can download it from downloads page.

Thanks to everyone for their support and Happy Holidays!

Added

  • advanced option to show current time in break window

Changed

  • updated many translations

Fixed

  • Typo in quotes
  • break not being resumed after DND if device was locked meanwhile on macOS
  • transparency not working in breaks
  • command line arguments
  • Turkish option in Welcome window
  • no break texts and time in break window
